item.title: ICC Pursues Putin: A Sprinkle of Justice in a World of Mischief
item.author: Ariana Yekrangi
item.description: The International Criminal Court's arrest warrant for Putin may be a small, symbolic step towards justice, but in a world where accountability is as dead as the dodo, it's a tune worth dancing to.
